title: DoorOpener
description: This project contains a smartphone app that let's you control a Raspberry Pi with which you can use your electric dooropener from your phone

title: MailReplierBot
description: In the Time of online lessons, our maths teacher always sent us mails where we should reply with a certain text so he knows we are not ignoring him, so i made this programm that replies with a self written message to emails that contain a certain text from a specified person.

title: HotKey Formatter
description: I often write mocking texts and I was getting tired of spamming the shift key, so i decided to write a background programm that converts the copied text with the press of a hotkey.
